name: Baby Bow -red $44.00
description:
Elasticated 100% leather soft soled booties. White / red suede bow with red soling. Very sweet!

Podiatrists recommend infants wear flexible shoes to allow room for growing feet. These shoes are made from soft calf hide and have non-slip suede soles which are double-stitched to add extra strength. Elasticated ankles make them easy to get on and off.

Box fresh! Lou's Shoes come gift boxed in baby blue boxes adorned with a very sweet bow.

Please allow 3-5 working days for your shoes to be custom made by Lou. Shipping within NZ is by overnight stork. Shipping overseas by albatross will vary from a 3-5 days to a few weeks depending on location.

name: Baby Mowgli - chocolate $65.00
description:
100% leather soft soled booties with elasticated ankles and velcro fastenings. The Baby Mowgli features a possum fur ankle wrap!  Possum fur has unique thermal qualities shared by arctic animals such as the polar bear and wolf - it traps heat and repels moisture and odor. Your babies feet will be toasty, dry and smell just as sweet! 

Unisex chocolate fur / suede with chocolate suede soling. Handcrafted in Dunedin, NZ by Lou. 

Possums are an introduced pest in New Zealand. They destroy native flora and fauna, depriving wildlife of their habitat. 

Podiatrists recommend infants wear flexible shoes to allow room for growing feet. These shoes are made from soft breathable leather and have non-slip suede soles which are double-stitched to add extra strength. Elasticated ankles and invisible velcro makes them easy to get on and off.

-------------------------

Size 3-6 mo: 10.8cm sole length
Size 6-12 mo: 11.7cm sole length 
Size 12-18 mo: 12.7cm sole length
Size 18-24 mo: 14.4cm sole length

A size chart is available from SIZING section.

-------------------------

SHIPPING
New Zealand: $5.00 courier
Australia: $5.50
Everywhere else $7.50

Please allow 3-5 working days for your shoes to be custom made. Shipping within NZ is overnight. Shipping overseas will vary from a 3-5 days to a few weeks depending on location. Please bear this in mind when choosing sizes.

name: Single Shoes!
description:
Lost a shoe? 

Just send a email to lou@lousshoes.co.nz and Cinderella (or Prince Charming) shall be magically reunited with their lost slipper!

Please email lou@lousshoes.co.nz the:
- Style
- Size
- Left or Right shoe
- Delivery Address

And your shoes shall be magically re-united!

(please disregard the $33.00 price tag - send an email instead to lou@lousshoes.co.nz)

name: Lou's Shoes Gift Certificate
description:
If you're unsure which shoes to pick then buying a Gift Certificate makes the decision easy!

Gift Certificates come in $44.00 and $59.00 and $65.00 NZD values and include a $5 postage cost. If you would like extra postage added (for instance to cover international postage or multiple orders) please contact me and I will create a custom value for you.

Once you have made your purchase I will email you the Gift Certificate - which you can either forward on or print out to present in person. The Gift Certificate will have a special code and expiry date and can be redeemed up to 12 months from date of purchase from www.LousShoes.co.nz

Gift Certificates cannot be redeemed for cash.
